sentence.Network_en: Prayers were said for souls in Purgatory.
sentence.Network_cn: 祷告词是为炼狱中的灵魂念的。

sentence.Network_en: Getting up at four o'clock every morning is sheer purgatory.
sentence.Network_cn: 每天早上四点起床简直是活受罪。

sentence.Network_en: Every step of the last three miles was purgatory.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后3英里时每一步都像是受罪。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 「炼狱（Purgatory）是天主教用来描述信徒死后灵魂暂时受罚的地方（或状态），是天主教教条之一。

purgatorial agony , fires ., 炼狱般的痛苦 , 大火.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French purgatorie or medieval Latin purgatorium, neuter (used as a noun) of late Latin purgatorius 'purifying', from the verb purgare (see purge)

entry.def: Purgatory is the place where Roman Catholics believe the spirits of dead people are sent to suffer  for their sins before they go to heaven.

example.ex: Prayers were said for souls in Purgatory.
example.tran: 祷告词是为炼狱中的灵魂念的。

entry.def: You can describe a very unpleasant experience as purgatory .

example.ex: Every step of the last three miles was purgatory.
example.tran: 最后3英里时每一步都像是受罪。

means.word_mean: 1. a temporary condition of torment or suffering;
2. (theology) in Roman Catholic theology the place where those who have died in a state of grace undergo limited torment to expiate their sins

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"场所,地点"; 2. 表形容词,"有……性质的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: condemn谴责+atory有……性质的→adj.非难的,处罚的
exclam=exclaim叫喊+atory有……性质的→adj.叫喊的,感叹的,惊叹的
explan=explain解释,说明+atory有……性质的→adj.解释[性]的,说明的
mand命令+atory有……性质的→adj.命令的,强迫的
oblige迫使,责成+atory有……性质的→adj.强制性的,义务的
propiti=propitiate讨好+atory有……性质的→adj.讨好的,调解的
conserve保存,保全+atory场所,地点→n.温室,音乐学院
labor劳动+atory场所,地点→劳动的地方→实验室
lav洗,冲+atory场所→冲洗的地方→洗手间
observe观察+atory场所,地点→用来观察的场所
purg纯洁+atory场所,地点→炼狱是人们净化灵魂之地

means.word_mean: 暂时受苦的地方, 暂时的苦难

sentences.cn: 滥用毒品而引起的痛苦
